I'm not sure I understand the theory behind the manual sweeps - maybe you c=
an help?

I thought the idea behind the electronic (franks box) sweeps is t=
hat the entities are the ones selecting the proper frequencies at the prope=
r time containing the relevant words they want to express.=A0 Is that true?=


If so, then doesn't the manual sweep completely override that process, si=
nce it is you that is turning the knob, and just looking for words you pers=
onally think are relevant?


--- On Fri, 6/5/09, Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@ya=
hoo.com> wrote:

From: Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...>
Subject: Re: [EVP=
-ITC] I am a Dummy
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Friday, June 5, 2009, =
10:49 AM











    
            
            


      
      With the =
RS hacks they are basically just opening the case carefully and cutting the=
 mute wire or pulling out the mute pin depending which=A0radio it is. Check=
 the archives for descriptions for each model. RS updated some versions of =
the radios so they were no longer able to be modified. Steve Hultay went on=
 to try it on a few other radios and got some good results. 
=A0
You can al=
so do a manual sweep with a radio that has a knob/dial or a scan function t=
hat doesnt jump the stations too quickly by simply scanning across the band=
. This method works great.
=A0
Misty

--- On Fri, 6/5/09, Eric VanDuzer <ev=

Question for Anyone

I wanna build A RS Hack Box bu=
t I am completely ignorant when it come to Electronic schematics and I am h=
aving trouble with my computer at home so I can't get any video or download=
 anything.=A0 Is there somewhere out there that explains the step by step i=
n "Layman's Terms" on how to build on.=A0 I know I am asking alot.=A0 Frank=
 maybe you should right a "FRANKS BOX for DUMMIES" Book LOL.=A0 Thanks for =
the help in advance



The Paranormal Preacher

Eric=A0
